Description: Fragment of the upper part of black-figure painted pottery situla. Female lion or panther carrying small deer: below, palmette.
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 604, 5 (and Pl. GB 597, 16)) (Group C.4)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 244)
